title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. The message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.' should not appear or should provide more context about why the hierarchies are not shown.
SR:
1. Open a binary project, such as org.apache.ant.
2. Check for the type hierarchy within the project.
3. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
